mapper.select: SELECT t2.* FROM manager_account_role t1 LEFT JOIN manager_account t2 ON t1.accountId = t2.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select DISTINCT t2.* from manager_role_resource t1 left join manager_resource t2 on t1.resource_id=t2.id where t1.role_id in(select role_id from manager_account_role t3 where t3.account_id=#{accountId}) and t2.application_id=#{applicationId} order by t2.resource_order desc
